page.title: 16GORDON'S DAY
page.content: I switched off the alarm,got up and ,in my dressing gown,put the kettle on.I dressed,made my own breakfast and while eating it and having a cup of tea,watched {T.V. AM} for a while.Mum stayed in bed today.She had a sore stomach.Dad was in bed as he had just finished {NIGHTSHIFT}.Soon it was time to go for the bus to {SCHOOL}.On the way my friends and I spoke of the Liverpool football disaster the night before.After school I did a little weeding in my garden before going in for tea.Mum and dad were up now but dad begins nightshift again at 9 o'clock.After some more gardening and watching T.V.I made dad a cup of tea before he went off to work.By 10.30 I was in bed {READING}my book for half an hour before going to sleep.
